src:
よみうりランド増収増益…競馬場の賃料収入が増

06 Nov 2019, 11:19

　よみうりランドが６日発表した２０１９年９月中間連結決算は、売上高が前年同期比６・８％増の１０５億円、最終利益は４２・０％増の１１億円で、増収増益となった。
　公営競技部門で地方競馬が好調なことから、所有する競馬場の賃料収入が増えたことが増収増益に寄与した。ゴルフ部門では、９月の台風１５号の影響で、千葉よみうりカントリークラブが６日間休業したが、他のゴルフ場の入場者数が好調で、前年同期並みの売り上げを確保した。遊園地部門は、長雨や低温による６月から７月にかけての天候不順を受け、プールや遊園地の来園者数が減り減収となった。
text:
Yomiuri Land increased sales and profits ... Rent revenue at the racetrack increased

06 Nov 2019, 11:19

Yomiuri Land announced on September 6 the consolidated financial results for September 2019, sales increased 6.8% year-on-year to 10.5 billion yen, and final profit increased 42.0% to 1.1 billion yen. It was.
The increase in rent income at the racetracks owned contributed to the increase in sales and profits due to the strong performance of local horse racing in the public sports sector. In the golf division, Chiba Yomiuri Country Club closed for 6 days due to the impact of Typhoon No. 15 in September, but the number of visitors to other golf courses was strong, and sales remained at the same level as the previous year. In the amusement park sector, the number of visitors to the pool and amusement park decreased due to bad weather from June to July due to long rain and low temperatures.
